description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The classic web game that too many students have wasted too much time on has arrived for the Xbox. Keep the volleyball in the air on your side and make it hit the ground on your opponent’s side or play co-op and see how long you can keep the ball in the air.
description.short: The classic web game that too many students have wasted too much time on has arrived for the Xbox. Keep the volleyball in the air on your side and make it hit the ground on your opponent’s side or play co-op and see how long you can keep the ball in the air.
